plot: After a miraculous visit to Simon's house, Jesus and his students leave Capernaum while under pressure from religious and Roman authorities. Jesus makes a surprise stop at Jacob's Well for an important encounter.

This episode, which ends Season One of The Chosen on a truly jubilant note, begins with the apostles drawing together, still confused, anxious for the Kingdom to come; and ends with Jesus' encounter with a foreign woman of a very dubious past. And with this encounter, His career finally becomes public.—jhboswell
